author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
We still haven't seen a new trailer for GTA 6, but Rockstar is expanding its portfolio of studios. Rockstar recently acquired Video Games Deluxe, who worked on the re-release of L.A. Noire and its VR spinoff, and helped fix Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy—The Definitive Edition after its underwhelming launch. No word yet on how this impacts GTA 6, if at all. In other news, blurry screenshots have emerged from a canceled Twisted Metal project. The game was apparently an online title that had traditional vehicular combat mixed with battle royale and on-foot elements. And finally, Monster Hunter Wilds' cheese naan cutscene is sending players on an IRL foodie hunt for actual cheese naan. In fact, an Indian restaurant in Tokyo actually ran out of cheese trying to fill all the orders.

#IGN #Gaming #GTA6
title: Ahead of GTA 6, What To Expect From Rockstar Games New Acquisition - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Here's how to find all 12 treasure maps and locations in Avowed to complete the Pathfinder achievement. There are 3 treasure maps in each region: Dawnshore, Emerald Stair, Shatterscarp, and Galawain's Tusks.

00:00 Intro
00:12 Intimidating Feline Codpiece (Dawnshore)
01:08 Captain Henqua's Spoils (Dawnshore)
02:46 Woedica's Inheritance (Dawnshore)
04:11 Painter's Regret (Emerald Stair)
05:40 Practical Pockets (Emerald Stair)
06:40 Earthy Aegis (Emerald Stair)
08:15 Robe of the Arcane Cheater (Shatterscarp)
09:32 Seafarer's Boots (Shatterscarp)
10:19 Dead Man's Mail (Shatterscarp)
11:23 Ancient Arrowhead (Galawain's Tusks)
12:58 My Loyal Shield (Galawain's Tusks)
14:22 The Blade That Hungers (Galawain's Tusks)

For Avowed tips and tricks, check out our full Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/avowed

#IGN #Gaming
title: Avowed - All 12 Treasure Maps and Locations

author: IGN
description: No friend to play Split Fiction with? No problem. Check out the fun new Split Fiction trailer for this upcoming co-op adventure game to learn about the Split Fiction: Friend Edition, along with a simpler solution to finding a friend to play with. Split Fiction will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC via EA App, Steam and Epic Games Store on March 6, 2025.
title: Split Fiction - Official 'Friend Edition Unboxing' Trailer (Josef Fares)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Daredevil: Born Again teaser trailer for the upcoming Marvel Television series. Daredevil: Born Again stars Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio. The series also stars Margarita Levieva, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Wilson Bethel, Zabryna Guevara, Nikki M. James, Genneya Walton, Arty Froushan, Clark Johnson, Michael Gandolfini, with Ayelet Zurer and Jon Bernthal. Daredevil: Born Again premieres on Disney+ on March 4 at 6pm PT/9pm ET.

In Daredevil: Born Again, Matt Murdock (Charlie Cox), a blind lawyer with heightened abilities, is fighting for justice through his bustling law firm, while former mob boss Wilson Fisk (Vincent D’Onofrio) pursues his own political endeavors in New York. When their past identities begin to emerge, both men find themselves on an inevitable collision course.

Dario Scardapane is showrunner. Episodes are directed by Justin Benson & Aaron Moorhead, Michael Cuesta, Jeffrey Nachmanoff, and David Boyd; and executive producers are Kevin Feig
title: Daredevil: Born Again - Official 'Tomorrow' Teaser Trailer (2025) Charlie Cox, Vincent D’Onofrio

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Signalis, a sci-fi psychological survival horror game developed by rose-engine. Players will seek the truth behind a cosmic mystery in a dystopian future where humanity is presented with a dark and sinister secret. Scavenge supplies, evade dangerous creatures, and embody Elster as she searches for her lost dreams. Signalis is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Windows and Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Signalis - Official Launch Trailer | Games with Wings Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Trailer for Kitori Academy, a life simulator RPG developed by Cubenary. Players will embody a wizard apprentice with a trusty spirit companion to aid on adventures. Master magical skills, brew potions, and catch spells to take the fight to those that lurk in the shadows of the world. Kitori Academy is coming soon for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kitori Academy - Official Gameplay Trailer | Games with Wings Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Official Trailer for Project Haven, an upcoming turn-based tactical strategy game developed by Code Three Fifty One. Players will a mercenary crew across the unforgiving streets of Earth's last city. Take on high-risk missions, upgrade equipment, and lead the Steel Dragons to salvation. Project Haven is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Project Haven - Official Trailer | Games with Wings Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out over 4 minutes of combat gameplay from Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 in this clip from the upcoming RPG. The gameplay video features a Nevron called Évèque and shows turn-based combat in action. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S (available day one with Xbox Game Pass), and PC via Steam on April 24, 2025.

Join Expedition 33 as they embark on a desperate quest to end the Paintress’ reign of death. Follow the trail of past Expeditions, and discover their fates. Enter a fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France, where surreal enemies and breathtaking landscapes await.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Official Combat Gameplay Clip

author: IGN
description:
Today's the day. Check out the new The Woman in the Yard trailer for the upcoming horror film from Blumhouse. The Woman in the Yard stars Danielle Deadwyler (Till, The Harder They Fall, and Station Eleven). 

The Woman in the Yard is directed by Jaume Collet-Serra (Black Adam, Jungle Cruise), who recently directed Deadwyler in the action thriller Carry On. The film is written by first-time feature screenwriter Sam Stefanak.

The film is produced by Jason Blum, producer of Five Nights at Freddy’s, M3GAN and The Black Phone, along with acclaimed Emmy nominated filmmaker Stephanie Allain (The Exorcist: Believer, Hustle & Flow), and is executive produced by star Danielle Deadwyler, director Jaume Collet-Serra, Gabrielle Ebron, Scott Greenberg and James Moran.

The Woman in the Yard opens in theaters on March 28, 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: The Woman In The Yard - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Danielle Deadwyler, Russell Hornsby

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Shrek 5 teaser trailer for the cast announcement reveal. Shrek 5 stars Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, and Zendaya. Shrek 5 opens in theaters in Christmas 2026.

#IGN #Movies #Shrek
title: Shrek 5 - Official Cast Announcement Teaser (2026) Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Zendaya

author: IGN
description:
Order 13 gets a creepy new trailer and a release date. Check out the new Order 13 trailer for this upcoming simulation horror game ahead of the game's launch on PC via Steam on March 10, 2025.

Pack orders, navigate the warehouse, and stay on your toes—because you're never alone in the dark. And whatever you do, make sure to take care of your cat.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Order 13 - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Steam, and Nintendo Switch on August 5, 2025. Watch the latest Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 trailer for this upcoming action game to see how the Entertainment District Arc is portrayed in the Story mode.

#IGN #Gaming #DemonSlayer
title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - The Entertainment District Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Now taking reservations for Madam Bo’s Tea House. Open for business soon. Check out the latest Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns teaser trailer for the fighting game to see Madam Bo in action. Madam Bo joins Mortal Kombat as a Kameo Fighter on March 18, 2025.

Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns expands Liu Kang’s New Era with a new story campaign and an all-new cinematic experience. Discover how Liu Kang rallies his champions and puts faith in his enemies as he battles the ruthless Titan Havik, who threatens to plunge the realms into khaos. If they fail, the New Era will be reduced to anarchy.

#ign #gaming #mortalkombat1
title: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns - Official Madam Bo Kameo Fighter Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 grabbed us by the throat from the jump and didn’t let go for a single second of the three-and-a-half-hour demo we played through – twice. This RPG might be something really special. Previewed by Will Borger
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 – The Final Preview
